item.description: A great local spot with trails, a meadow, stream, and links to the Robert Frost trail if you're really adventurous. Plan for about an hour and a half, maybe longer. See you then!
item.how_to_find_us: I have a black jacket, black lab w/blue leash, & white PT Cruiser

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Walking with dogs, Hiking with dogs, and people, too! April Meetup
